\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {\partial \Delta ^1 \times \Lambda _k ^n} & {\Delta ^1 \times \Lambda _k ^n} \\
	& {\partial \Delta ^1 \times \Delta ^n} & \square \\
	{\Lambda_k^n} &&&& {\Lambda_k^n} \\
	{\Delta^n} && {\Delta^1 \times \Delta ^n} && {\Delta^n}
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\pi _0}", from=1-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[curve={height=-12pt}, hook, from=1-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook', from=3-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow["{\iota_1}", from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["p", from=4-3, to=4-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
